description: Monitor for files created on a system after a user clicks on a malicious link. Look for common download paths and suspicious files with executable extensions. Analytic 1 - Files downloaded from links and then executed. sourcetype=Sysmon EventCode=11 | search file_path IN ("*/Downloads/*", "*/Temp/*") | stats count by file_name file_path user | where file_name LIKE "%.exe" OR file_name LIKE "%.zip" OR file_name LIKE "%.js" OR file_name LIKE "%.docm"
